name: Nothing to Declare
storyline:
Congratulations! You now work at the Populistan International Airport, but this is not your usual airport… You'll have to prove that you are capable of being a security agent at this prestigious, absolutely 0% corrupt airport.

Your job will consist of checking passports, making sure people are who they say they are and don't forge documentation, pat down people if you need to, find contraband and above all, follow the orders from your superior.
summary: Nothing to Declare is a story-driven VR game with multiple endings where you play as a security agent in the Populistan International Airport. Your job is simple: check passports, frisk people, find contraband, make sure documents are in order and most important, follow the orders of your superior.
